<Division of Lang
2:
--------------------
Text: Division of Lang:  It originally included the suburbs of Kogarah and Marrickville, but by the time it was abolished in 1977, it covered the suburbs of Lakemba and Belmore.

4:
--------------------
Text: Division of Lang:  It was held by the Labor Party for all but one term after 1928, and in its final form was very safe for that party.
Triplets:<Division of Lang
5:
--------------------
Text: Division of Lang:  It was abolished at the redistribution of 31 October 1977.
